00025 void testCallback(void* arg){
00026     std::string teststring = (const char *)arg;
00027     ev << "CALLBACK EXECUTED! " << teststring << endl << endl;
00028 }
00029 
00030 unsigned int main(){
00031     //tte_init();
00032     tte_buffer_t testbuffer;
00033     if(tte_get_ct_output_buf(0, 100, &testbuffer) != ETT_SUCCESS){
00034         ev << "MIST1!" << endl << endl;
00035         return -1;
00036     }
00037 
00038     ev << "tte_get_channel_cnt(): " << tte_get_controller_cnt() << endl << endl;
00039 
00040     uint8_t mac[6];
00041 
00042     tte_get_var(0, TTE_VAR_MAC_ADDRESS,sizeof(mac), mac);
00043 
00044     ev.printf("TTE_VAR_MAC_ADDRESS: %02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x\n\n", mac[5], mac[4], mac[3], mac[2], mac[1], mac[0]);
00045 
00046     if(tte_set_buf_var(&testbuffer, TTE_BUFVAR_TRANSMIT_CB, sizeof(void(*)(void*)), (void*)&testCallback) != ETT_SUCCESS){
00047         ev << "MIST21!" << endl << endl;
00048         return -1;
00049     }
00050     if(tte_set_buf_var(&testbuffer, TTE_BUFVAR_CB_ARG, 5, "SENT") != ETT_SUCCESS){
00051         ev << "MIST22!" << endl << endl;
00052         return -1;
00053     }
00054 
00055     tte_frame_t frame;
00056     frame.length=46;
00057 
00058     frame.eth_hdr.src_mac[0] = 0x00;
00059     frame.eth_hdr.src_mac[1] = 0x00;
00060     frame.eth_hdr.src_mac[2] = 0x00;
00061     frame.eth_hdr.src_mac[3] = 0x00;
00062     frame.eth_hdr.src_mac[4] = 0x00;
00063     frame.eth_hdr.src_mac[5] = 0x00;
00064 
00065     frame.eth_hdr.dst_mac[0] = 0x00;
00066     frame.eth_hdr.dst_mac[1] = 0x00;
00067     frame.eth_hdr.dst_mac[2] = 0x00;
00068     frame.eth_hdr.dst_mac[3] = 0x00;
00069     frame.eth_hdr.dst_mac[4] = 0x00;
00070     frame.eth_hdr.dst_mac[5] = 0x00;
00071 
00072     if(tte_open_output_buf(&testbuffer, &frame) != ETT_SUCCESS){
00073         ev << "MIST2!" << endl << endl;
00074         return -1;
00075     }
00076     if(tte_close_output_buf(&testbuffer) != ETT_SUCCESS){
00077         ev << "MIST3!" << endl << endl;
00078         return -1;
00079     }
00080 
00081     tte_buffer_t testbuffer2;
00082     if(tte_get_ct_output_buf(0, 100, &testbuffer2) != ETT_SUCCESS){
00083         ev << "MIST4!" << endl << endl;
00084         return -1;
00085     }
00086     if(tte_set_buf_var(&testbuffer2, TTE_BUFVAR_RECEIVE_CB, sizeof(void(*)(void*)), (void*)&testCallback) != ETT_SUCCESS){
00087         ev << "MIST41!" << endl << endl;
00088         return -1;
00089     }
00090     if(tte_set_buf_var(&testbuffer2, TTE_BUFVAR_CB_ARG, 9, "RECEIVED") != ETT_SUCCESS){
00091         ev << "MIST42!" << endl << endl;
00092         return -1;
00093     }
00094 
00095     return 0;
00096 }
